title: Boku no Lunch wo Jamasuruna!
original_name: 僕のランチを邪魔するな！
sinopse:
Yoneda Iku is a high school freshman. The thing he loves the most about his high school life is lunch time. Rather than club activities and romance, this is a comedy about Iku dedicating his youth to his lunch!

(Source: Official site)
